dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1383 IH: To amend title XIV of division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to equalize the treatment of States and outlying areas.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan (for himself, Mrs. Christensen, Ms. Bordallo, and Mr. Faleomavaega) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend title XIV of division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to equalize the treatment of States and outlying areas.

subsection.text: Section 14001 of division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–5; 123 Stat. 279) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (b) through (f) as subsections (a) through (e), respectively.

subsection.text: Section 14013(5) of such division is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking and the and insert the; and
by striking Rico; and inserting Rico, and each of the outlying areas (as defined in section 9101 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7801));.
